name: Jasper
messages: Dayum Jasper! You're a party animal!
Can I buy a second serve? I'm not done yet!

my_events.title: How to train your robot class

my_events.description: Let's buy more than hoolahoops for the football team please because Coach E is down 1, thank you.

my_events.title: How to train your robot class

my_events.description: I had a cruel summer but this concert will be fantastic

my_events.title: MARS Workday
my_events.description: Oh you thought you had New Years off, mwahaha no you don't. The members have New Year's off tho, I guess I gotta quit being Computer Team lead

my_events.title: Cookin
my_events.description: Sprinkle Kraft cheese on bread and plop it in the microwave, wallah, thats cooking

my_events.title: MARS Workday
my_events.description: CEO Kalkwarf said we need to get top 3, so I must do my part to execute the vision!

my_events.title: MARS Workday
my_events.description: So its 2am and I'm hungry. Cookout time :(

my_events.description: Siri, what can I cook with just salt and sugar?

mars_events.description: I told you we love sports!
